import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import config from '../../config.json' import EventOptions from './EventOptions' import EditEvent from './EditEvent' function EventPage({event, deleteEvent, setPageOptions}) { const [options, setOptions] = useState(0) const dateArr = Date(event.date).split(" ") let dateString = "" dateArr.forEach((item, i)=> i<4? dateString+=item+" ": dateString+="") return
{event.name}
0? config.baseUrl+"/"+event.images[0].url:''}>
{dateString}
{event.type.name}
Total participants: {" "+event.registrations.length}

{event.details}

{options == 0? :''} {options == 3? :''}
} export default EventPage
